name: Puzzle Master: Wonders
description:
Puzzle Master: Wonders is my first game completely finished and released. It is a classic collection of "15 Puzzle" games with images of the Wonders of the World and UNESCO's World Heritage Sites.

Features:
- 12 puzzles, all unlocked. Just choose and play.
- Relaxing and themed soundtrack for each puzzle.
- Dark mode.

If you liked this game, consider making a donation.
By supporting this project, you will help in the development of even better games from GS Games!
